sections.heading: and governmental agencies; suits against
sections.text: The state and governmental agencies created by the state may be sued upon claims arising under the Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act in the same manner as provided by such law for suits against other employers.SourceLaws 1979, LB 67, ยง 2;Laws 1983, LB 447

48-1126.State and governmental agencies; suits against.

The state and governmental agencies created by the state may be sued upon claims arising under the Nebraska Fair Employment Practice Act in the same manner as provided by such law for suits against other employers.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 67, ยง 2;Laws 1983, LB 447, ยง 74.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Fair Employment Practice Act, see section 48-1125.
